attributes.description: This shows that although a product might be invented in one country many factory's and large company's choose to outsource so that products are cheeper and their profit margin is larger. This however usually involves exploiting people so To show where in the world just one iphone has been and how much work was put into it this sourcemap will show.
attributes.title: Iphone

attributes.description: This is where the Iphone was originally created and invented. However do to outsourcing they are no longer being produced here. This is however where the final product will end up for approval before it hits the market for the first time.
attributes.title: Apple headquarters

attributes.description: Memory chips and Data configuration is produced here and then sent to China.
attributes.title: Switzerland

attributes.description: Some of the memory chips are produced here and then sent to china to be assembled.
attributes.title: Germany

attributes.description: Parts of the touch screen are also created here and then sent to China.
attributes.title: Japan

attributes.description: This Factory is probably the trunk of the Apple tree. It is in charge of Assembly, Inventory, pickup, packing and of course shipping. All the parts that are sent here are assembled and then sent all over the world to be sold to millions of people.
attributes.title: Apple Shenzhen

attributes.description: This Factory produces a number of specific parts that can be found inside of an iphone. It then sends its products to China.
attributes.title: Marvell

attributes.description: This U.S based factory makes touch screen controllers not surprisingly these parts are then also sent to China.  Only to be sent back to the U.S to be sold or to be sent to other countries to be put on the market.
attributes.title: Broadcomm

attributes.description: The Taiwan facility manufactures stainless metal casings. These are the casings that hold our phone together. These too are then sent to China so that everything can be placed inside of them.
attributes.title: Catcher Technology

attributes.description: The Taiwan facility manufactures printed circuit boards. Like the other products from Taiwan this is then also sent to China. Think of it as a puzzle that is then assembled there.
attributes.title: Umicron Technology

attributes.description: They manufactures bluetooth chipsets these are what we use to exchange data or send photos over a short distance. They are also used to transmit the radio these are then sent to China.
attributes.title: Cambridge Silicon

attributes.description: The Taiwan facility manufactures connectors. These are the items we use to charge or plug in our iphones interesting to know they are originally from china.
attributes.title: Entery Industrial

attributes.description: The Taiwan facility manufactures internal circuitry. Taiwan is one of apples main suppliers unlike the common belief that everything is produced in China. The truth is that the parts are simply sent to china for cheap assembling.
attributes.address: Tucheng District, New Taipei City, Taiwan 236
attributes.title: Foxconn International

attributes.description: This is where the Digital Camera Modules are created. They are then sent to China.
attributes.title: Primax Electronics

attributes.description: This Factory manufactures Baseband Communications hardware. That is then sent to china for further manufacturing.
attributes.title: Infineon

attributes.description: The Singapore facility manufactures CPU and Video processing chips. This is basically what helps you take a home video. This is then sent to china so it can be assembled into the iphone.
attributes.title: Samsung
